step.cmd: Navigate to Create Tests>Test Cases in the left side navbar. Click the Create Test Case button in the top right corner of the Test Case List page to create a test case.
Replace Untitled in the top left corner of the screen on the Test Case Details page with a Title for the title case.
You can create the test steps for your test case using either of the following methods:

substep.cmd: Write Test Steps Manually using NLPs by clicking Add new step
Use Testsigma Recorder to Record steps.

info.note: You should install the Testsigma test step recorder extention
